ChangeNote: When Decompose derivatives, Calculate synthetic interest and Decompose index contracts is selected in performance calculation, the cash flow values for constituents also include Decomp synth accrued interest xOD, according to the cash flow timing setting in the performance calculation. Previously that only applied to the component type Spot (decomposed to constituents), but not Constituent from spot.
Internal testing tool for Alternatives Release Verification Pipeline. Rerun flaky tests to reduce developer time spent on false positives
The AM Cache did not use the 'Order fill updates event throttling threshold'-value from the setup - it defaulted to 5 seconds
Create manual compliance failure alert in some cases happens where Branch column has no value and it effects directly on the setting up a cause for the alert.
From time to time there is crash when running PFC for Deferred P/L results. The error is fixed.
Update current rule tables for importing rule lib folders vis ConfigMgr
Check service config on launching thread
Fixed a a performance issue: When using grouping from either Current Positions api or AM Cache Get data api with a high number of groups would perform so slow that user would get a timeout
Fix random selections in Source Fields grid after statement change , scroll and other row selection.
new formula values added
When reconciliation tries to do a one side matching it could count results that were marked as deleted. This could lead to one side matching when amount is not netted to 0. This error was fixed
Check on index error in DWA DBI functions.
Crash in cnfTrp service by importing Performance Measurement. Was fixed
Calculate commission for web allocate

Crash when applying order defaults 
with dynamic bank account to a large number of orders is fixed.
New Check Before Upgrade
Add opportunity to create empty bm files, even if on uncalculated date
If more than one column is passed to insert values column by column.
Fixing of possible sorting issue leading to incorrect data read and so incorrect data exported with GL Format setup
The issue is fixed by adding an extra check in the code.

Added the ability to generate and save AOCI amortization transaction via the Create end-of-period transaction window when the amortization amounts for the entire position is zero, but there are amounts ​​for AOCI match  lots.
The sanity check for the loan facilities tables has been revised. Previously, it was incorrectly triggered when the substitution framework functionality was used.
Fixed incorrect translation of domains on CTM load
Pool factors should only be updated for relevant instruments and transactions.
Auxiliary double check job for US MBS Pools didn’t work correctly when creating trade via External client trade window and having parameter ‘only status changed’ set to Yes. It was fixed.
Fixing crash during execution of FX Rate Update fund event while trying to update IQ rate
Support F-TIIE(OIS) in Mexican Inflation Curve (Mexican UDI) estimation
Disabled performance tests. Changes made to the code do not affect system behavior.
New dimensions - Options Security, FRA Security, new fact for Flex Values Decomposed and fix for Cash Transaction fact
Fixed extrapolation of volatility for volatility curve given by risk reversal and butterfly spread for Linear int.pol method.
Quotes of underlying security are used for Theoretical price, convertible bonds  (OneLib) and Quoted prcie +yield curve, convertible bonds price methods
Current Positions and AM Cache now respects per-portfolio Load Cash-settings that are set in the data selections.  Previously they were ignored
Add logging to user authorization batch job, such as how many setups, data selections are found in the installation, how many setups are processed every minute.
Improved OutOfMemoryException handling to reduce the risk of hanging process.
Standard Product with the Index which had Termination Date = 20-06-2025, was removed from the SpecFlow tests

Before when calling GetDestionationConfig, we got destinationConfig for all entries and a client was created for all of them. Now you can pass in the destiantionIds to GetDestionationConfig and only get the ones you need. 

Also better tracing is added
Added two null guards to protect code from crashing in DataLayerClients
We removed rounding for all estimated  'Correction index' and ‘Correction additional index’ calculations, including dollar inflation sensitivity
Added retaining of the "selected" state of the Use Outbox Selection button when switching layout/setup
User authorization batch job fixing infinite loop due to corrupted data selectors and removing output to local file in case user has no access
In rare cases, it was a group code performance issue related to the group code update via batch job. This has now been corrected.
No longer look at full history of assignments including removed assignments when importing global and legal set assignments via Configuration manager

When decomposing an index contract in the Portfolio Calculation the end of day nominal weights were scaled incorrectly with the effect that among others the 'Clean Value QC/PC' and the 'Balance Nominal/Number' were  incorrectly calculated. This has been fixed.
S-198899: revert changes to apply the tactical solution only for UBS
Fixed filtering out direct brokers for FX & FI orders
The maturity date is used to select the new security for a Credit Event transaction in cases where there is an ambiguity.
Fixed Class field value "Preliminary transactions" for Orders API V3
"Permission to establish database connection has not been granted" was returned when after writing a new password if the password was reset. This has been corrected.
Transaction List in Alerts Inbox can be a huge and that impacts performance. We need to limit how much we can load, max 1000 transactions and not older than 1 month.

For 'Open ended'  'Securities Lending' positions with 'Fee paid' set to 'Last in month'  and 'Underlying' 'Bonds' was not possible anymore to create the final  'Premium' transactions after the position was closed on its 'Maturity date'. This has been fixed.
Add summary dependency fields to the cache job
Fixed AM crashes while working with Browser host widgets loaded to Dashboards
The number of instances for APL worker services was increased
Introducing a popup with the option to halt the generating of special customer tables when selecting this in the portal
Made a performance enhancement for loading the Event Status in the Fund Administration Manager
CustomerApplyNote: Made a performance enhancement for loading the Event Status in the Fund Administration Manager

ChangeNote: Fixed an error in the fund decomposition area, where the decomposition profiles "Max Age" functionality would sometimes exclude too many components.
Fix missing Audit history on assignment sub-list after transfer configuration
Add IncludeLineBreaksInHeaders option to data export
Remove SQ code smell
Trim long message about multiple force finished orders, so that it does not crash the message service
Fixed the click event propagation in case of the client editor validation error
Calculating Payment amount PC as a sum of its PC constituents when recalculating with MDF fx rate
In certain specific cases, the user role password could unintentionally be part of a memory dump. This has now been corrected.
The email audit functionality has been reintroduced.
Remove default query on active passive determination
Corrections to the C# NetCore Services build
Fixed issue with UETR on Swift relay massages

New setting to control Dynamic bank account behavior is added to Order options. When the setting is unchecked, dynamic bank account is expanded and sorted according to the Show system configuration -> Currency setting.
When the setting is checked, dynamic bank account is expanded to BAs quoted in order's settlement currency.
Fixed Model Portfolio field value on Portfolio Sheet during benchmark compression.
Internal integration tests related change: clients should not be affected.
Fixed Missing InsType Invalidates IMW Swap Security Dimension
Database is change to handle numbers the same way as Balance Nominal number Simulation

Fixed an issue in the Standard Contracts Deposits screen, wherein the three fields "Term is business days", "Term length" and "Term unit" would not be correctly opened by the checkbox "Use standard term structures".
Clean UploadFileEndpointTest and do not run doDelete if fileName is null or empty
Only load relevant Shock Structure
The batch job "Corporate Actions - Election Data Preparation" should update balances even for elections that are not included in the CAE API GET results.

The memory execution of segments when applying settlement defaults for many transactions has been optimized. E.g. when applying settlement defaults for forecasted transactions generated during a portfolio calculation.

On this change 3 improvements are implemented to improve strategy analysis application applet performance: (1). Optimize commitment aggregation logic when fetching middle office data; (2) Avoid unnecessary operations when computing IRR; (3) Avoid unnecessary data transformation and lookup when displaying data.
Add performance improvement for Modified Parametric VaR calculation and logs.

Fix result of DX_PKG.KEYEXPAND function.  IMPORTANT NOTE: this fix changes result of DX_PKG.KEYEXPAND if 3rd argument is not VARCHAR  from 'KEY:  42' (where 42 is value of 1st argument) to actual value of this field.

As part of performance improvements done in the Reporting pool where new Load hidden lines functionality was implemented, an unintended side-effect was that data import of Reporting pool data no longer worked. This has been fixed.

TMP/FIN deviation is corrected if the SO Accrued interest transaction is being booked on Fin. Calc booking track and when it was prior backdated by sell on position status. The problem occurs when AI per tax lot functionality is activated on the FAM. This problem prevented saving further TLCA transactions.
New setting  "“Auto-release order after pre trade validation override"" is added to Order Options to control the order release workflow.
Target exposures and portfolio currency files shoulb be creaated only with version 2 and not with version 1 when running Axioma Batch Job.

In some special cases when using the 'Pricing Method' 'From Key ratio calculation' and in case a 'Key Ratio Mapping' having 'Exclude from' son the 'Key Ratio Mapping' set to 'Portfolio Calculation' this setting was wrongly ignored. This has been fixed.
The "Price compensation" fund event did not work, when a multi-class fund invested in a pool fund. The error has been corrected.
A client specific change for loading of transactions in the portfolio calculation running on a period closure framework.

The cash effect from the commodity leg of the futures’ maturity transaction must be accounted for in the forecast cash flow service. The administrative transactions for particular holdings, which are already registered in the system should be saved into the 'Forecast Cash Flow - Payments' table. The instrument type for the commodity is added to the list where CP and CD already are present.
Fixed an error that prevented a user from manually deleting compliance list limits when the option "Keep limits when a list element is removed".
Using 'Investment structure (oldest)' together with 'Is null' or 'Not null' didn't work. This has been corrected.
As a user I can Allocate equity orders using Allocate form in the Web UI
Customer-specific fix for a customer-specific issue.
Internal changes for the Collateral tests
Webrequestcustom throws an exception when the exception message is empty, even though the getErrorResponse attribute is set to true.
Some warning messages got lost due to a recent necessary code change. Now, the behavior for multiple CA events per days should be restored by using different approach.
This change fixes a crash of developer tool in external installation. No impact on business functionality.
Fix Delete operation in PositionUniverse transporter
Improve code quality
A fix for side effects caused by another defect that prevents unnecessary post change actions in the window 'Maturity Fx Outrights'
When closing a TRS holdings in some special cases the 'Accrued interest QC/PC was not 0. This has been fixed.
Changes to the CCDSWAPS table were not always broadcasted to the rest of the SCD One. The error has been fixed.
Fix ORA crash in compliance cleanup when there is so much data to be deleted that it is split in chunks
Fix folder path
The transaction generation engine should filter away planned credit events that lie before or on the position’s FROMDATE.
Fix hanging loading in treelist
Redemption transactions is not visible in the Cash Viewer applet when the Expected Payment Date is shifted on today and historical mode is turned off. This has now been corrected.
Fixed issue with deleting/modifying private debt transaction with payments
Sensitive NetRootDirectory and oauth parameters have been removed from telemetry log.
Fix  crash for OneLib convertible bonds in Risk
A database error occurred when getting dependencies for a segment using the NAIC field. This has been corrected.
Fixed an issue in the portfolio calculation, where a missing holding of a loan facility, would abort the whole of the calculation.
Prevent crash when delta vectors are not available
Added logging information to provide more information when crash happens

The recalculation of current values and settlement amounts should not be triggered for irrelevant field changes in the truGen or truCostPstChg environment for transactions native to the window Exercise Options.
N/A: Disabling Internal integration tests
Remove data selection changed event send to MT, since it's not needed anymore

The data cleanup service only deleted performance counter data once a month, even if the performance counter table wasn’t partitioned. This has been corrected.

If the table is partitioned data will be deleted once a month (drop partition).
If the table is not partitioned data will be deleted daily.
Dependencies for entries of type MOCALCMAN_OPTIOINS was missing. This has been corrected.
Re-implemented validation in Loan Facilities to restrict changes in events transactions for which have been created already
Disable TM authorization framework for API instruments and adjusted CalcAdjustedCDSINdexAllocations
It was not possible to stream to New UI in German installations.
Remove FAP validation, client specific
scd.exe -batch=<batch job name> -ba_queue=<batch queue name> -wait is now responding back when the job actual has finished  for long running batch job.
Reduce the risk for database deadlocks during unit tests.
DWH: Fixed "Exception of type ApplicationException was thrown"
[TECHNICAL/3T] restored help functions still used in commands
Fixed OTC web API tests. Changes do not affect any customer installations.
Handling cases where election data for the same CA notification is updated and calculated simultaneously by several users/processes.
ABS accounting values (book values / unrealised P/L) were wrong when simulating in the Asset Manager.  This has now been corrected.
Technical 3T
Making market data validation set up consistent with schedule.
Fixed the re-initialization of auxillary jobs when deleting reporting pool records
Remove unit test formulas from the client's installation.
Fixing binding issue, fix has been patched into 25,04 and 25,07 as well
Fixed issue with slow performing query that read ratings data.  This could lead to a slow startup of the Asset Manager
Client specific change: Changed error, when reversing a payment with PCL records using the STP/Batch Job, into a warning.
